p: All microbial strains were obtained from the Microbiology Laboratory, Drug Applied Research Center, Tabriz University (Tabriz, Iran) of Medical Sciences. Stock cultures of gram-positive S. aureus (ATCC 29213), gram-negative E. coli (ATCC 25922), and C. albicans (ATCC 10231) were sub-cultured and maintained on nutrient agar at 37 °C for 24 h; subsequently, they were diluted in sterile saline solution (0.85% w/v) to reach a final concentration of 0.5 McFarland (~1.5 × 10 8 colony-forming units [CFUs]/mL).
